reviews.review_msg: agreed, his quizzes came out of "left field." david should've mentioned them in the course syllabus or several times in the weeks leading up to them. plus, he asked hard questions that i couldn't answer because i forgot to read the books. seriously though, this was a great class and david is a great prof.
Carl is great. Brilliant. One of my best profs ever.

The people here who have given Deanna a poor rating must be "out-to-lunch"!  She is truly one of the best, most thorough, and easily approachable profs at SFU.  Deanna cares about her students, and, more importantly, her subject--that's rare.  She is passionate and a joy to learn from.  Take her class.
Deanna is a great professor. She's very enthusiastic about the material and really likes students to get hands-on experience with the texts. Also, very flexible with due dates. Highly recommend!
